short_summary: Delivery of 16 RF analyzer kits to be completed by March 29, 2024.
description: The department has a requirement for three RF analyzer kits and 13 RF test kits to be delivered to various locations...
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP) for Electronic Hardware Components

### Title

RF Analyzer Kits

### Solicitation Number

30004906

### Reference Number

CB-619-63388637

### Requester

Fisheries and Oceans Canada

### Description

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires the procurement of various electronic hardware components, including three (3) Bird SiteHawk Cable & Antenna Analyzers Kits (SK-6000-TC Kit) or equivalent, and thirteen (13) Bird Master RF Test Kits (SK-SH-KITA Kit) or equivalent. These components will be used at various CCG locations and are required to support the agency's operations.

### Delivery Requirements

Delivery is requested to be completed by no later than March 29, 2024.

### Procurement Details

*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services (Category 32130000 - Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories)
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canada complies with various international free trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, among others.

### Tenders and Pricing

Qualified bidders shall submit their tenders in accordance with the provided documentation. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price. Tenders should include all relevant information and pricing details.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarifications regarding this RFP, please contact:
   + Stephanie Patry
   + Phone: (343) 576-8973
   + Email: stephanie.patry@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

### Attachments

The tender notice document can be accessed at the following links:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23271/30004906---npp_en.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23271/30004906---npp_fr.pdf

### Tender Closing Date and Time

The deadline for submitting tenders is November 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will not be considered.

Please ensure that you carefully review the tender notice document and terms and conditions before submitting your bid.
